org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core

Interface Assertion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Evidentiary, SAMLObject, SignableSAMLObject, SignableXMLObject, org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject

    public interface Assertion
extends SignableSAMLObject, Evidentiary
    SAML 2.0 Core Assertion.
